meanings.sent1: She had yens for chocolate all day.
meanings.sent2: His yens for adventure led him to explore new places.
meanings.sent3: Her yens for ice cream made her run to the store in excitement.
meanings.sent4: The yens for knowledge burned within him like a bright flame.
meanings.sent5: The yens for success drove her to work hard every day.

meanings.definition: To have a strong desire or craving for something.
meanings.sent1: He yens to travel to far-off lands.
meanings.sent2: She yens for a taste of the delicious cake.
meanings.sent3: The cat yens for attention by meowing loudly.
meanings.sent4: The plant yens for sunlight to grow tall and strong.
meanings.sent5: The child yens for a new toy to play with.
